Text: A New Era of Thought is a non-fiction work written by Charles Howard Hinton, was published in 1888 and reprinted in 1900 by Swan Sonnenschein & Co. Ltd., London.

2:
--------------------
Text: A New Era of Thought:  It influenced the work of P.D. Ouspensky, particularly his book "Tertium Organum" where it is frequently quoted, "Scientific American" writer Martin Gardner, who mentioned this book in some of his articles, and influenced Rudy Rucker's "The Fourth Dimension".
Triplets:<P.D. Ouspensky
3:
--------------------
Text: A New Era of Thought:  It is prefaced by Alicia Boole and H. John Falk.
Triplets:<Alicia Boole
4:
--------------------
Text: A New Era of Thought:  "A New Era of Thought" is inspired by Plato's allegory of the cave and is influenced by the works of Immanuel Kant, Carl Friedrich Gauss and Nikolai Lobachevsky.
Triplets:<Plato
